summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Ozoxx EAD training platform. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend authentication, navigation, and core features functional. Minor issues with error message display and some dashboard content loading.

ui_bugs.issue: Error messages not displayed for invalid login attempts
Dashboard content cards ('Continuar Aprendendo', 'Ver Recompensas') not always visible

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix login form error message display for invalid credentials. Investigate dashboard content loading issues where cards may not appear consistently.
